sentences.en: A number of local people have been arrested for trying to obstruct lorries loaded with logs.
sentences.cn: 一些当地人因试图阻止满载原木的卡车通行而被逮捕。

sentences.en: A small aircraft was obstructing the runway.
sentences.cn: 一架小型飞机堵住了跑道。

sentences.en: Claire positioned herself so as not to obstruct David's line of sight.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔为了不挡住戴维的视线挪了一下位置。

sentences.en: Don't let anything obstruct the lens.
sentences.cn: 别让任何东西挡住镜头.

sentences.en: He became still more dissatisfied with it and secretly did everything in his power to obstruct it.
sentences.cn: 他对此更不满意,尽在暗里使绊子.

sentences.en: His goal throughout the Hiss case was to obstruct our efforts to uncover the facts.
sentences.cn: 在整个希斯案件中,他的目的是阻碍我们揭露真相.

sentences.en: It is a crime for the President to obstruct justice.
No units or individuals shall obstruct or restrict them.
sentences.cn: 任何单位和个人不得限制和阻挠.

sentences.en: No units or individuals shall obstruct the Customs in performing its duties.
sentences.cn: 海关依法执行职务,任何单位和个人不得阻挠.

sentences.en: Private members attempt to obstruct the passage of the bill.
sentences.cn: 下院议员企图阻止议案的通过.

sentences.en: The column obstructed our view of the stage.
sentences.cn: 柱子挡着，我们看不见舞台。

sentences.en: The defences are intended to obstruct any advance by tanks and other vehicles.
sentences.cn: 这些防御工事用于阻止坦克等车辆前进。

sentences.en: The fallen trees obstruct the road.
The group is trying to obstruct the peace process.
sentences.cn: 该团体试图阻挠和平进程。

sentences.en: To block off or obstruct ( a pipe or valve, for example ).
sentences.cn: 阻塞 ( 如管道或阀门 )

sentences.en: To block up or obstruct by filling or clogging.
sentences.cn: 通过装满或塞满来堵塞或阻碍.

sentences.en: Total planning seems to obstruct growth in direct proportion to the scale of the economy.
sentences.cn: 全面规划似乎阻碍了经济规模与增长成正比例的发展.

sentences.en: What they cannot defeat by reason and argument they obstruct by delay and legalistic guile.
sentences.cn: 凡是他们不能通过理智和辩论战胜的东西,他们便采用拖延的办法和玩弄法律的手段来加以阻挠.

words.tran_cn: 阻挠议事的；蓄意阻挠的

trans.tran_en: to block a road, passage etc
to block a road, passage etc
